mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_id, username, password, name, gender, birthdate, phone, address, email, record, role, create_time, last_login_time, update_time, status, remark) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update admin

username = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admin WHERE CONCAT(IFNULL(`username`,''),IFNULL(`name`,''),IFNULL(`birthdate`,''),IFNULL(`phone`,''),IFNULL(`address`,''),IFNULL(`email`,''),IFNULL(`record`,''),IFNULL(`role`,''),IFNULL(`create_time`,''),IFNULL(`last_login_time`,''),IFNULL(`update_time`,''),IFNULL(`remark`,'')) LIKE '%#{keyWord}%' limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
